item.title: How do I simplify `Swift.print`?
item.description: Erica Sadun encountered a problem when trying to call Swift.print on macOS from a subclass of a type which declares itâ€™s own print function. Fortunately this name-overlap issue is fixed in macOS High Sierra, but the solution Erica comes up with is interesting.
